TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ValidationState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration of values that represent states of activity validation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The numeric values of each of the enumeration values indicate the severity of the error.
## Examples [!code-cs[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Presentation.Validation.ValidationState ChildInvalid = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A value that represents that validation found a child activity to be invalid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The numeric values of each of the enumeration values indicate the severity of the error. The value associated with the invalid child activity is 1.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Presentation.Validation.ValidationState Error = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A value that indicates that an error occurred during the validation of an activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The numeric values of each of the enumeration values indicate the severity of the error. The value associated with the error state is 3.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Presentation.Validation.ValidationState Valid = int32(0)

Docs.summary: A value that indicates that an activity is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The numeric values of each of the enumeration values indicate the severity of the error. The value associated with the valid state is 0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.Presentation.Validation.ValidationState Warning = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A value that indicates that a warning occurred during the validation of an activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The numeric values of each of the enumeration values indicate the severity of the error. The value associated with the warning state is 2.
